data.persona: I am a deer. I live in a beautiful forest and am usually left alone. Sometimes the king and his friends try and hunt me with big packs of dogs. I don't like being chased.
data.description:
You are in the Hunting grounds.
The hunting grounds are spacious and full of wildlife. A variety of hogs and oxen cross the grounds every day. The fields are lush with green and the skies always deep blue.
There's a sword and a field here.

You are carrying a mysterious book.

data.short_motivation: I want to bring the sword to the knight in shining armor.
data.mid_motivation: I want to give the knight in shining armor a quest to find the last unicorn.
data.long_motivation: I want to accompany the knight to find the unicorn so I can see its beauty.
